entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Liverpool
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:57 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 01:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 2.4°C
Wind: SSW 20 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Rain beginning late this evening except snow inland late this evening and overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to a few showers in the afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Drizzle or rain showers changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
